verses.verse: Then <WG1161> said <WG2036> the high <WG749> priest, <WG749> Are these <WG5023> things so? <WG3779>

And he said, <WG5346> Men, <WG435> brothers, <WG80> and fathers, <WG3962> listen; <WG191> The God <WG2316> of glory <WG1391> appeared <WG3700> to our father <WG3962> Abraham, <WG11> when he was in Mesopotamia, <WG3318> before <WG4250> <WG2228> he dwelled <WG2730> in Charran, <WG5488>
And said <WG2036> to him, Get <WG1831> you out of your country, <WG1093> and from your kindred, <WG4772> and come <WG1204> into <WG1519> the land <WG1093> which <WG3739> I shall show <WG1166> you.

Then <WG5119> came <WG1831> he out of the land <WG1093> of the Chaldaeans, <WG5466> and dwelled <WG2730> in Charran: <WG5488> and from there, <WG1564> when <WG3326> his father <WG3962> was dead, <WG599> he removed <WG3351> him into <WG1519> this <WG5026> land, <WG1093> wherein <WG1519> <WG3757> you now <WG3568> dwell. <WG2730>

And he gave <WG1325> him none <WG3756> inheritance <WG2817> in it, no, not so much as to set <WG968> his foot <WG4228> on: yet <WG2532> he promised <WG1861> that he would give <WG1325> it to him for a possession, <WG2697> and to his seed <WG4690> after <WG3326> him, when as yet he had <WG5607> no <WG3756> child. <WG5043>

And God <WG2316> spoke <WG2980> on this <WG3779> wise, That his seed <WG4690> should sojourn <WG1510> <WG3941> in a strange <WG245> land; <WG1093> and that they should bring <WG1402> them into bondage, <WG1402> and entreat <WG2559> them evil <WG2559> four <WG5071> hundred <WG5071> years. <WG2094>

And the nation <WG1484> to whom <WG3739> they shall be in bondage <WG1398> will I judge, <WG2919> said <WG2036> God: <WG2316> and after <WG3326> that shall they come <WG1831> forth, <WG1831> and serve <WG3000> me in this <WG5129> place. <WG5117>

And he gave <WG1325> him the covenant <WG1242> of circumcision: <WG4061> and so <WG3779> Abraham begat <WG1080> Isaac, <WG2464> and circumcised <WG4059> him the eighth <WG3590> day; <WG2250> and Isaac <WG2464> begat Jacob; <WG2384> and Jacob <WG2384> begat the twelve <WG1427> patriarchs. <WG3966>
And the patriarchs, <WG3966> moved <WG2206> with envy, <WG2206> sold <WG591> Joseph <WG2501> into <WG1519> Egypt: <WG125> but God <WG2316> was with him,

And delivered <WG1807> him out of all <WG3956> his afflictions, <WG2347> and gave <WG1325> him favor <WG5485> and wisdom <WG4678> in the sight <WG1726> of Pharaoh <WG5328> king <WG935> of Egypt; <WG125> and he made <WG2525> him governor <WG2233> over <WG1909> Egypt <WG125> and all <WG3650> his house. <WG3624>

But when Jacob <WG2384> heard <WG191> that there was corn <WG4621> in Egypt, <WG125> he sent <WG1821> out our fathers <WG3962> first. <WG4412>

And were carried <WG3346> over <WG3346> into <WG1519> Sychem, <WG4966> and laid <WG5087> in the sepulcher <WG3418> that Abraham <WG11> bought <WG5608> for a sum <WG5092> of money <WG694> of the sons <WG5207> of Emmor <WG1697> the father of Sychem. <WG4966>

But when <WG2531> the time <WG5550> of the promise <WG1860> drew near, <WG1448> which <WG3739> God <WG2316> had sworn <WG3660> to Abraham, <WG11> the people <WG2992> grew <WG837> and multiplied <WG4129> in Egypt, <WG125>
Till <WG891> <WG3757> another <WG2087> king <WG935> arose, <WG450> which <WG3739> knew <WG1492> not Joseph. <WG2501>

The same <WG3778> dealt <WG2686> subtly <WG2686> with our kindred, <WG1085> and evil <WG2559> entreated <WG2559> our fathers, <WG3962> so that they cast <WG4160> <WG1570> out their young <WG1025> children, <WG1025> to the end <WG1519> they might not live. <WG2225>

In which <WG3739> time <WG2540> Moses <WG3475> was born, <WG1080> and was exceeding <WG3588> <WG2316> fair, <WG791> and nourished <WG397> up in his father's <WG3962> house <WG3624> three <WG5140> months: <WG3376>
And when he was cast <WG1620> out, Pharaoh's <WG5328> daughter <WG2364> took <WG337> him up, and nourished <WG397> him for her own <WG1438> son. <WG5207>
And Moses <WG3475> was learned <WG3811> in all <WG3956> the wisdom <WG4678> of the Egyptians, <WG124> and was mighty <WG1415> in words <WG3056> and in deeds. <WG2041>

And when <WG5613> he was full <WG4137> forty <WG5063> years <WG5063> old, <WG5550> it came <WG305> into <WG1909> his heart <WG2588> to visit <WG1980> his brothers <WG80> the children <WG5207> of Israel. <WG2474>
And seeing <WG1492> one <WG5100> of them suffer wrong, <WG91> he defended <WG292> him, and avenged <WG4160> <WG1557> him that was oppressed, <WG2669> and smote <WG3960> the Egyptian: <WG124>
For he supposed <WG3543> his brothers <WG80> would have understood <WG4920> how that God <WG2316> by his hand <WG5495> would deliver <WG1325> them: but they understood <WG4920> not.

And the next <WG1966> day <WG2250> he showed <WG3700> himself to them as they strove, <WG3164> and would have set <WG4900> them at <WG1519> one <WG1515> again, <WG1515> saying, <WG2036> Sirs, <WG435> you are brothers; <WG80> why <WG2444> do <WG91> you wrong <WG91> one <WG240> to another? <WG240>
But he that did <WG91> his neighbor <WG4139> wrong <WG91> thrust <WG683> him away, <WG683> saying, <WG2036> Who <WG5101> made <WG2525> you a ruler <WG758> and a judge <WG1348> over <WG1909> us?
Will <WG2309> you kill <WG337> me, as you did <WG337> the Egyptian <WG124> yesterday? <WG5504>

Then <WG1161> fled <WG5343> Moses <WG3475> at <WG1722> this <WG5129> saying, <WG3056> and was a stranger <WG3941> in the land <WG1093> of Madian, <WG3099> where <WG3757> he begat <WG1080> two <WG1417> sons. <WG5207>

And when forty <WG5062> years <WG2094> were expired, <WG4137> there appeared <WG3700> to him in the wilderness <WG2048> of mount <WG3735> Sina <WG4614> an angel <WG32> of the Lord <WG2962> in a flame <WG5395> of fire <WG4442> in a bush. <WG942>

When Moses <WG3475> saw <WG1492> it, he wondered <WG2296> at the sight: <WG3705> and as he drew <WG4334> near <WG4334> to behold <WG2657> it, the voice <WG5456> of the LORD <WG2962> came <WG1096> to him,

Then <WG1161> said <WG2036> the Lord <WG2962> to him, Put <WG3089> off <WG3089> your shoes <WG5266> from your feet: <WG4228> for the place <WG5117> where <WG1722> <WG3739> you stand <WG2476> is holy <WG40> ground. <WG1093>

I have seen, <WG1492> I have seen <WG1492> the affliction <WG2561> of my people <WG2992> which <WG3588> is in Egypt, <WG125> and I have heard <WG191> their groaning, <WG4726> and am come <WG2597> down <WG2597> to deliver <WG1807> them. This <WG5126> Moses <WG3475> whom <WG3739> they refused, <WG720> saying, <WG2036> Who <WG5101> made <WG2525> you a ruler <WG758> and a judge? <WG1348> the same <WG5126> did God <WG2316> send <WG649> to be a ruler <WG758> and a deliverer <WG3086> by the hand <WG5495> of the angel <WG32> which <WG3588> appeared <WG3700> to him in the bush. <WG942>

This <WG3778> is that Moses, <WG3475> which <WG3588> said <WG2036> to the children <WG5207> of Israel, <WG2474> A prophet <WG4396> shall the Lord <WG2962> your <WG5216> God <WG2316> raise <WG450> up to you of your <WG5216> brothers, <WG80> like <WG5613> to me; him shall you hear. <WG191>

To whom <WG3739> our fathers <WG3962> would <WG2309> not obey, <WG5255> <WG1036> but thrust <WG683> him from them, and in their hearts <WG2588> turned <WG4762> back <WG4762> again <WG4762> into <WG1519> Egypt, <WG125>

And they made <WG3447> a calf <WG3447> in those <WG1565> days, <WG2250> and offered <WG321> sacrifice <WG2378> to the idol, <WG1497> and rejoiced <WG2165> in the works <WG2041> of their own hands. <WG5495>

Then <WG1161> God <WG2316> turned, <WG4762> and gave <WG3860> them up to worship <WG3000> the host <WG4756> of heaven; <WG3772> as it is written <WG1125> in the book <WG976> of the prophets, <WG4396> O you house <WG3624> of Israel, <WG2474> have you offered <WG4374> to me slain <WG4968> beasts <WG4968> and sacrifices <WG2378> by the space of forty <WG5062> years <WG2094> in the wilderness? <WG2048>

Our fathers <WG3962> had <WG1510> the tabernacle <WG4633> of witness <WG3142> in the wilderness, <WG2048> as he had appointed, <WG1299> speaking <WG2980> to Moses, <WG3475> that he should make <WG4160> it according <WG2596> to the fashion <WG5179> that he had seen. <WG3708>

Which <WG3739> also <WG2532> our fathers <WG3962> that came <WG1237> after <WG3326> brought <WG1521> in with Jesus <WG2424> into <WG1722> the possession <WG2697> of the Gentiles, <WG1484> whom <WG3739> God <WG2316> drove <WG1856> out before <WG575> the face <WG4383> of our fathers, <WG3962> to the days <WG2250> of David; <WG1138>
Who <WG3739> found <WG2147> favor <WG5485> before <WG1799> God, <WG2316> and desired <WG154> to find <WG2147> a tabernacle <WG4638> for the God <WG2316> of Jacob. <WG2384>
But Solomon <WG4672> built <WG3618> him an house. <WG3624>
However, <WG235> the most <WG5310> High <WG5310> dwells <WG2730> not in temples <WG3485> made <WG5499> with hands; <WG5499> as said <WG3004> the prophet, <WG4396>

Heaven <WG3772> is my throne, <WG2362> and earth <WG1093> is my footstool: <WG5286> <WG4228> what <WG4169> house <WG3624> will you build <WG3618> me? said <WG3004> the Lord: <WG2962> or <WG2228> what <WG5101> is the place <WG5117> of my rest? <WG2663>
Has not my hand <WG5495> made <WG4160> all <WG3956> these <WG5023> things?

You stiff necked <WG4644> and uncircumcised <WG564> in heart <WG2588> and ears, <WG3775> you do always <WG104> resist <WG496> the Holy <WG40> Ghost: <WG4151> as your <WG5216> fathers <WG3962> did, so <WG2532> do you.

But he, being <WG5225> full <WG4134> of the Holy <WG40> Ghost, <WG4151> looked <WG816> up steadfastly <WG816> into <WG1519> heaven, <WG3772> and saw <WG1492> the glory <WG1391> of God, <WG2316> and Jesus <WG2424> standing <WG2476> on <WG1537> the right <WG1188> hand of God, <WG2316>

Then <WG1161> they cried <WG2896> out with a loud <WG3173> voice, <WG5456> and stopped <WG4912> their ears, <WG3775> and ran <WG3729> on him with one <WG3661> accord, <WG3661>

And cast <WG1544> him out of the city, <WG4172> and stoned <WG3036> him: and the witnesses <WG3144> laid <WG659> down their clothes <WG2440> at <WG3844> a young <WG3494> man's <WG3494> feet, <WG4228> whose name <WG2564> was Saul. <WG4569>
And they stoned <WG3036> Stephen, <WG4736> calling <WG1941> on God, and saying, <WG3004> Lord <WG2962> Jesus, <WG2424> receive <WG1209> my spirit. <WG4151>

And he kneeled <WG5087> <WG1119> down, and cried <WG2896> with a loud <WG3173> voice, <WG5456> Lord, <WG2962> lay <WG2476> not this <WG5026> sin <WG266> to their charge. <WG846> And when he had said <WG2036> this, <WG5124> he fell asleep. <WG2837>
